hero.title: TracedAI - Transforming Surveillance into Intelligent Insights
hero.subtitle: Empowering retail by transforming surveillance into intelligent insights with precision footfall analytics and demographic insights from your existing surveillance footage

features.title: The world's first extensive dwell-time analysis
features.subtitle: Experience the world’s first GDPR compliant service that offers advanced AI analytics, granting you unparalleled visibility. Unleash the full potential of your surveillance and make smarter decisions with a complete dwell-time analysis

features.title: Complete Dwell-Time Analysis
features.description: Transform raw surveillance footage into actionable insights with our comprehensive dwell-time analysis. Gain valuable knowledge about customer journeys and individual purposes from entrance to exit.

features.title: Real-Time Crowd Counting
features.description: Accurately quantify the number of visitors at any given time. Optimize staffing, operations, and emergency response with real-time data.

features.title: Demographic Analytics
features.description: Enhance your understanding of your audience. Our advanced AI models deliver precise age and gender distribution data for your visitors, enabling you to optimize your marketing efforts effectively.

features.title: Seamless Integration
features.description: TracedAI seamlessly integrates with your current surveillance infrastructure, requiring no additional hardware. We empower your existing system, making it smarter without any hassle.

newsletter.title: Stay Ahead with TracedAI Insights
newsletter.subtitle: Join our mailing list to receive the latest updates, insights, and special offers from TracedAI, directly in your inbox. Be the first to know about our advancements in AI-powered retail analytics.

questions.question: How does TracedAI integrate with my existing surveillance systems?
questions.answer: TracedAI seamlessly integrates with most existing surveillance systems. Our solution is designed to work with your current setup, without the need for additional hardware. All we need is access to your video feeds.

questions.question: How accurate is the demographic data from TracedAI?
questions.answer: TracedAI leverages state-of-the-art AI models to deliver high-precision demographic data. While no system can guarantee 100% accuracy, our solution has been tested extensively and has consistently achieved industry-leading accuracy rates.

questions.question: Is TracedAI compliant with privacy regulations?
questions.answer: Yes, TracedAI is designed to be fully compliant with privacy regulations. Our solution processes video data in real time and does not store personal identifying information. We prioritize privacy and data protection in all aspects of our operations.

questions.question: How can TracedAI help improve my retail operations?
questions.answer: TracedAI provides you with actionable insights about your visitor traffic and demographics, helping you make data-driven decisions. This can help you optimize staffing, plan marketing strategies, improve customer experiences, and ultimately increase revenue.

questions.question: What support is available for TracedAI users?
questions.answer: TracedAI offers comprehensive customer support to ensure smooth operations. We have a dedicated team of technical experts available to assist you with any issues or questions you may have about our solution.

endSalesPoint.title: Embrace the Future of Retail with TracedAI
endSalesPoint.subtitle: Make every decision count with precise and real-time crowd analytics. Join the TracedAI community today and turn your surveillance footage into a strategic asset.
